author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII simulation
- **RunII CRAFT scenario** : [81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_36_42](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_36_42) as [81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_36_42/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5): 
  - removed updates of Tracker misalignment scenario and RPC noise/efficiency
- **RunII Asymptotic scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_31_55](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_31_55) as [81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_31_55/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5): 
  - removed updates of Tracker misalignment scenario and RPC noise/efficiency
- **RunII Startup scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_startup_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_37_42](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_startup_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_37_42) as [81X_mcRun2_startup_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_startup_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_startup_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_37_42/81X_mcRun2_startup_v5): 
  - removed updates of Tracker misalignment scenario and RPC noise/efficiency
- **RunII Heavy Ions scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_38_26](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_38_26) as [81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_38_26/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v6): 
  - removed updates of Tracker misalignment scenario and RPC noise/efficiency
## Upgrade
- **PhaseI realistic scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_40_18](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_40_18) as [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v9) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_Candidate_2016_08_30_11_40_18/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v9): 
  - removed updates of Tracker misalignment scenario and RPC noise/efficiency
title: rolling back bad updates introduced for Tranche-IV MC
